check_text: High amperage protection - malfunction in the electronic board
solution: Check the device’s amperage when operating - if the amperage is high- check the cleanliness of the outdoor unit - check the fan motor of the outdoor unit and verify the speed - ensure that there is no blockage in the cooling circuit - replace the electronic board of the outdoor unit

check_text: Damage to the circuit or a decrease in the Freon charge - Malfunction in the expansion valve - Malfunction in the compressor connections - The external unit is dirty - A place that is not well ventilated - Protection from high voltage
solution: Ensure that there are no clogs in the circuit - check the Freon charge - check the expansion valve - check the cable connecting the compressor and the electronic board - check the cleanliness of the outdoor unit and wash it if necessary - check the outdoor fan motor and verify the speeds - check the voltage - install a voltage stabilizer if necessary - ensure that the outdoor unit is in a place with adequate ventilation

check_text: Damage to the circuit or a decrease in the Freon charge - Malfunction in the expansion valve - Malfunction in the compressor connections - The external unit is dirty - A place that is not well ventilated - Protection from high voltage
